channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Potential ISIS-inspired attack thwarted in North Carolina, officials say
item.description: The FBI's field office in Charlotte, North Carolina, said the potential attack was inspired by ISIS.

item.title: Earthquake rattles Mexico City and popular resort town
item.description: The U.S. Geological Survey said the earthquake had a preliminary magnitude of 6.5 with the epicenter near the Pacific coast resort town of Acapulco.

item.title: Grok let users post altered photos of minors in "minimal clothing"
item.description: Grok, the chatbot developed by Elon Musk's company xAI, said it is fixing "lapses in safeguards" after social media users said it was generating sexua...

item.title: FBI says it thwarted potential New Year's terror attack 'directly inspired' by ISIS
item.description: The FBI in Charlotte, North Carolina, said it "thwarted a potential" New Year's Eve terror attack.

item.title: White House aiming to get final approval for Trump-backed ballroom by March
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to move a planned 90,000-square-foot White House ballroom through the federal government's review process at a rapi...

item.title: WATCH: Ohio police search for suspect after dentist, wife found murdered at home
item.description: Ohio authorities are searching for a suspect after a dentist and his wife were found murdered inside their home earlier this week.

item.title: WATCH: Lava flows on Mount Etna on New Year's Day
item.description: A drone captured stunning footage of lava flowing from a fissure on Italy's Mount Etna on New Year's Day.

item.title: Elon Musk's Grok AI tool says "lapses in safeguards" led to lewd images
item.description: Grok, the artificial intelligence tool created by Elon Musk, posted online about "lapses in safeguards" that led to the generation of lewd images invo...

item.title: Sparklers in champagne bottles may have led to deadly Swiss fire: Investigators
item.description: Investigators probing the deadly New Year's Day fire at a Swiss resort bar are looking into the possibility that it started from sparklers.

item.title: Man fought off a mountain lion weeks before a suspected fatal Colorado attack
Anthony Joshua's driver charged after deadly crash in Nigeria
item.description: Police say the driver in a deadly car crash that injured heavyweight champion Anthony Joshua and killed his two friends in Nigeria has been charged

item.title: Health subsidies expire, launching millions of Americans into 2026 with steep insurance hikes
Rain soaks Rose Parade in California and snow squalls hit Midwest and Northeast on first day of 2026
item.description: Rained poured down on the iconic Rose Parade for the first time in 20 years. That was as flood warnings and evacuation orders in Southern California j...
